title: Did Congress ‘Set Aside’ $50 Billion in 2006 for the Construction of Border Fencing?
subtitle: When some leading Democrats voted for the Secure Fence Act, were they agreeing to 10 times more funding than President Donald Trump requested for his border wall in 2018?
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: By passing the Secure Fence Act in 2006, U.S. Congress members were voting to allocate or set aside $50 billion in funding for border fencing.
